title: Full electrical installation of new build house
review:
We had a full electrical installation done on our new build home, and the electrician was brilliant from start to finish. He worked to a high standard, was professional throughout, and went above and beyond to offer helpful advice.

He gave us great suggestions on how to save energy, like using LED lighting, efficient layouts, and even future-proofing options like wiring for solar panels and EV charging. His knowledge helped us make smart choices that will pay off in the long run.

He also provided valuable input on the positioning of fixtures, sockets, and switches. His ideas made a real diff
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
